amendment.description: To appropriate an additional $625,000,000 for discretionary grants for high-threat, high-density urban areas.

action.text: Amendment SA 3632 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3632 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 50. Record Vote Number: 178.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3632.

Amendment SA 3632 proposed by Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S9172-9173, S9174-9176, S9182; text: CR S9172) To appropriate an additional $625,000,000 for discretionary grants for high-threat, high-density urban areas.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3632 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 50. Record Vote Number: 178.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3632 proposed by Senator Clinton.
